oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Men's Brotherhood Class
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: churches; Merton Avenue Christian Church; portraits; religion; 1940s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Men and women pose on the steps of a church. Note on back identifies this as Merton Avenue Christian Church during the 1940s.
